book.title: He's Just Not That Into You: The No-excuses Truth to Understanding Guys

review.body: Terrible, unhelpful, poor writing, awful format, scrapped-together piece of a book. If you want some real advice and something helpful, don't waste your time with this.

Wow! Ummm I'm speechless!

Review coming soon
Can't wait to see what volume 2 has in store cause I can imagine it only gets doper!
Oddly, I didn't like the revised and longer version of this. I thought the initial version was sweeter, the new version wasn't as awesome.

Having not read any other books by the author, I wasn’t sure what to expect when I began “Sand and Blood”, but I found myself enjoying this fantasy coming of age story a great deal. Taking place in a desert setting, the book introduced me to Rutejìmo a youth who has not yet gone through his clan’...

book.title: Every Exquisite Thing
book.publisher: Little, Brown Books for Young Readers

review.body: Nanette O'Hare likes to eat lunch alone in a classroom versus the school cafeteria. This is how she befriends a teacher, who also prefers to eat alone rather than the teacher's lounge. This teacher ends up gifting Nanette "The Bubblegum Reaper." A cult novel, according to him, that changed his li...

book.title: Hard Goals : The Secret to Getting from Where You Are to Where You Want to Be

review.body:
New flavor of good complex distilled thought.

A good distillation and addition of the latest in brain science ... Like a good whiskey. Great take on complex subject

book.title: Future Babble: Why Expert Predictions Fail - and Why We Believe Them Anyway

review.body: After being absorbed in George Friedman's book on predicting how the 21st century may unfold (See below "The Next 100 Years ...") it is a sobering read to see how Dan Gardner demonstrates that "experts" invariably miss the mark, and do it to an outrageous degree. Mr. Gardner offers the following...

الفكرة رائعة ، لكنها ليست جديدة .
الخاتمة لم تٌنه القصة ، كانت تحتاج إلى إكمال ، وربما لو كانت أطول لكانت أجمل .
ستكون رائعة لو كان لها جزء ثانٍ مكمل .

book.title: The Storied Life of A. J. Fikry

review.body:
Could have used some better relationship development.

I liked this book, didn't love it. I felt it skipped the necessary components required when falling in love with your characters and rooting for them or their relationships with others. Would like to have read more of AJ and Amelias courtship,...

book.title: Ride: Bad Hangover: BBW Paranormal Shape Shifter Romance (Puca Mates Short Book Five)

review.body:
Review for RIDE PT 5 by A.C.JAMES
Received as an ARC for an honest review
Cynthia Beckett, known as Cyn to her friends, is on holiday in the Aran Islands with her friend when she misinterprets statement made to her by Tomas, a Puca shifter. She ends up beyond the Veil, the divider between the human...

This was a very exciting mystery. Bea Abbot is standing in her own doorway, watching the neighbors clear the ivy off the common wall, when too many pulls results in the entire garden wall coming down like dominos, which uproots a large tree, which land almost on top of Bea in her door. So begins...
Lots of "aww" moments in this one. ^_^
Loved it. Jaymin Eve is an amazing writer. I love this series and it is one of my favourites.

book.title: Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear

review.body:
Creativity is the energy of life. Without it our lives are dull but when we learn to embrace and appreciate our innate creativity we can do great things.

I especially appreciated the part about ideas being entities that want us to express them. I see ideas a little differently but the idea was ver...
Aww.... Great book... is different that the boy not is who's scared of compromise... Jajajaja

book.title: Love & Lies - Alles ist verziehen (Forgiving Lies, #2)

review.body:
Cover:

Die Ausarbeitung des Covers gefällt mir sehr gut, denn es zeigt in meinen Augen nicht nur ein Pärchen, vielmehr wirkt dieser Bildausschnitt für mich, wie ein Rückblick auf eine vergangene Zeit, die man zurück sehnt. Ebenso wirkt die Mimik der Frau und des Mannes sehnsuchtsvoll. In ihnen lie...
An entertaining read with interesting characters.
